record.title: READ ACROSS AMERICA DAY

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of S. Res. 91.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating to the resolution be printed in the Record, with no intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
